quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the first ever Global Digital Health Summit, Expo & Innovation Awards was held at New Delhi. It was co-hosted by Government of India & Internet Governance Forum, United Nations. What was theme for this event?
options: Sustainable health goals
Digital Health for all
Digital access to health solutions
Health is universal right
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), the winner of the Water Heroes: Share Your Stories Contest 3.0 for the month of September 2022 has been announced. Which of the following statements is/are correct in this regard?

A. Its first edition was held in the year 2019

B. It is held monthly on MyGov Portal

C. A cash prize of Rs. 10,000 is being awarded to winners
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), 1st Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) - India Start-up Festival (AISF) was held at Cibinong Bogor, Indonesia. This festival was held to commemorate which anniversary of the ASEAN-India diplomatic relationship?
options: 25th
20th
30th
32nd
35th

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), the 7th Annual Meeting of Board of Governors of Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) was held in virtual mode with the theme “Sustainable Infrastructure Toward a Connected World”. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to AIIB?

A. AIIB was established in the year 2014

B. Headquarters of AIIB is situated in Beijing (China)

C. India is a founding member of AIIB
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Union Minister for Commerce & Industry met with the representatives from Indian Textile Industry. As per the key-information shared, export target of Indian textile industry is to achieve ______ in the next 5 to 6 years.
options: USD 40 billion
USD 50 billion
USD 70 billion
USD 80 billion
USD 100 billion

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), which of the following institutions has launched the HARIT Aaykar (Hariyali Achievement Resolution by Income Tax department) initiative.
options: Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT)
Central Board of Indirect taxes and Customs (CBIC)
Department of Revenue and Exprenditure
1 and 2
1 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), which of the following organizations has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Government of Assam with an objective to support and accelerate the Government of Assam’s mission to promote digital growth and development in the state.
options: Meta
Twitter
Microsoft
Google
Tesla

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), ‘Mission Schools of Excellence’ project was launched by the Prime Minister of India in the state of Gujarat. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with respect to Mission School of Excellence?

A. Total outlay for the project is Rs. 5,567 crore

B. A total of 20,000 government schools are being covered under first phase

C. It is the largest holistic school transformation programme in the country
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), India and France have been re-elected as the president and co-president of International Solar Alliance (ISA). Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to ISA?

A. International Solar Alliance was launched in the year 2015

B. Headquarters of ISA is located in Paris

C. At present, 110 members are there in the ISA
options: A and C
A and B
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI) under the aegis of ‘Azadi ka Amrit Mahotsav (AKAM)’ organized a “National Workshop on Developing/Reviewing Sub-National Level Monitoring Framework for SDGs”. How many Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) have been adopted by the United Nations?
options: 14
15
16
17
18

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), G7 countries have asked India to join in its Just Energy Transition Partnership (JETP). Which of the following statements are correct with respect to JETP?

A. Just Energy Transition Partnership was announced at the 21st Conference of Parties (COP-21) held at Paris

B. A similar JETP model has been proposed by G7 nations in June 2022

C. Canada and Italy are the part of G7 nations
options: A and B
B and C
A and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Government of Assam & US Agency for International Development (USAID) have launched the trees outside forests in India (TOFI) programme in Assam. TOFI would help India to create an additional carbon sink of 2.5-3 billion tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent by which of the following years?
options: 2025
2027
2030
2032
2035

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), which of the following has become the first jeweller in India to import gold under the India – United Arab Emirates (UAE) Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement (CEPA)?
options: PC Jewellers
Kalyan Jewellers
Tanishq
Kiran Gems Pvt Ltd
Malabar Gold and Diamond

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Chief Minister of which state has launched a common credit portal SAFAL (Simplified Application for Agricultural Loans) for the welfare of farmers?
options: Assam
Uttar Pradesh
Karnataka
Gujarat
Odisha

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), Steel Authority of India (SAIL) has become the first Central Public Sector Enterprise to achieve the major milestone of procurement value of Rs 10,000 Crore through the Government-e-Marketplace (GeM). Which of the following statements are correct with respect to the Government e-Marketplace (GeM)?

A. GeM was launched in 2016 by the Ministry of Commerce and Industry

B. It is based on 2 pillars – Efficiency and Inclusivity

C. Both private as well as government sellers can be listed on GeM
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), Delhi based shipping and logistics solutions provider Shiprocket has become the first inter-city logistics provider to join the Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC). Choose the incorrect statement in context to ONDC.
options: ONDC is an initiative of Ministry of Finance
It was incorporated in December 2021
ONDC is set up as a Non-profit organization under Section 8 of Companies Act, 2013
It aims to raise e-commerce penetration in the next 2 years to 25% of India’s consumer base
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), the Warehousing Development and Regulatory Authority (WDRA) has organized a seminar titled “Warehousing and Electronic Negotiable Warehouse Receipt (e-NWR) – An Effective Tool for Promoting Pledge Financing”. WDRA was constituted in the year 2010 with __________ acting as the nodal agency.
options: Department of Promotion of Industrial Trade
Department of Trade Regulations
Department of Food and Public Distribution
Department of Public Policy
Department of Grievance Redressal

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), 5th edition of the Indian wind industry’s biennial International Trade fair-cum-conference, “Windergy 2023”, is scheduled in the month of October, 2023 in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. As per the key-information shared in the event, how much cumulative Wind Power has been installed in India till September 2022?
options: 29,546 MW
33,494 MW
38,674 MW
41,666 MW
45,723 MW

quiz.text:
Recently (October 2022), Chief Justice of India inaugurated the two campaigns of the National Legal Services Authority (NALSA) aimed at inculcating the spirit of inclusivity. Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to NALSA?

A. NALSA was established in the year 2005

B. It is located at the Supreme Court of India

C. Chief Justice of India is the Chief Patron of NALSA
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (October 2022), a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) was signed between REC & Union Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. Under the MoU, REC, as a part of its Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) initiative, would be providing Rs. _____ towards National Sports Development Fund (NSDF).
options: 75 crore
100 crore
50 crore
90 crore
125 crore
